T02D2079:158b-3: autstshushm'a zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2079:158b-6: 'di'i cho ga ni nya'i dus nas phyi ma'i tshes
T02D2079:158b-7: bcu bzhi'i bar du bsod snyoms bslangs pa'i zan la
T02D2079:158b-8: chang bu gcig la sngags bzlas la rang bza'/
T02D2079:158b-9: gnyis pa la bzlas la chu la mar bsgyur la btang /
T02D2079:158b-10: zhag nyer gcig na gdol pa mo'i gzugs su byas nas sgrub po la lung ston te /
T02D2079:158b-11: de la skyug bro bar mi blta'o //
T02D2079:158b-12: de nas rang gi gzugs kyis gnas te ma 'am
T02D2079:158b-13: srid mo 'am chung mar gyur te dam bca' byas
T02D2079:158b-15: tshogs bsags pa'i gang zag gis zhag bdun na 'grub bo //
T02D2079:158b-16: bsod nams chung bas kyang zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D2079:158b-17: gis bram ze bas du zin kyang 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2079:158b-18: ro // grub nas di na ra lnga nyi ma re re la ster ro //
T02D2079:158b-19: zan gyi chang bu ster ba'i dus su mi med par zan bza'/
T02D2079:158b-20: mtshan mo gcig pur nyal bar bya'o //
